page.title: 06Transport in Edenbridge
page.content: Most people in Edenbridge own cars. A survey showed that the most popular are Austin/Rover. There are 7 garages in Edenbridge. Edenbridge has two railway stations - one of which is in our area and has a line running from Tonbridge to Redhill. The other line runs from Uckfield to Victoria. The trains are frequent and use diesel engines. The line in our area does not have a ticket office so people pay on the train. Buses in Edenbridge are fairly good. They are clean and the drivers are very helpful. However, they are infrequent and very expensive. There are six routes that the buses take around Edenbridge. There is also a good taxi service in the area.
